evidence.claim: VitalEngine utilizes AWS services for scalable API management and data storage.
The platform supports FHIR and HL7 standards for health data interoperability.
They implement X12 EDI for healthcare claim transactions processing.
Evident use of AWS Lambda for serverless architecture within their API systems.
Integration with various cloud services is highlighted on their developer documentation pages.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes X12 EDI transactions and provides health tech API solutions.
